# lyne-heading


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Usage

Use it like this: `<lyne-heading level="1" text="My title text"></lyne-heading>`



## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                  | Type                                     | Default                |
| ------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `level`       | `level`        | Heading level                | `"1" \| "2" \| "3" \| "4" \| "5" \| "6"` | `'1'`                  |
| `text`        | `text`         | Text for the Heading         | `string`                                 | `'Default title text'` |
| `visualLevel` | `visual-level` | Visual level for the heading | `"1" \| "2" \| "3" \| "4" \| "5" \| "6"` | `'1'`                  |


----------------------------------------------
